City Government
===============

The Haskell City Council meets the second Tuesday of each month at Haskell City Hall. Meetings are held at 7:00 a.m. and include a public comment section at the beginning of each meeting. You will need to fill out a sheet before the meeting in order to speak. 

To be placed on the agenda with a concern or a request, please contact Misti Bartley, City Secretary, at (940) 864-2333 (ext. 3) or citysecretary@haskelltexasusa.com or Mayor Christina Isbell at mayor@haskelltexasusa.com.

**Can’t make the meetings? [Click here to see the most recent agendas.](https://haskelltexasusa.com/agendas/)**

[Haskell City Ordinances](https://ecode360.com/HA6336)

Open Records Request
--------------------

If you’d like to request copies of specific records from the city, fill out the form below and someone from the city will be in touch with you soon.

* Phone

  This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
* Basic Information

  Name


  Phone
* Email and Record

  Email


  Record
* Other Information
